mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY r.reserv_date) AS rno,r.pet_name,r.owner_name,r.reserv_time,COUNT(*) AS count FROM (SELECT * FROM reservationview WHERE DATE_FORMAT(reservation_date, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE()) r ORDER BY rno

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY i.receive_time) AS ino,i.pet_name,i.owner_name,i.receive_state,i.pay_yn FROM (SELECT * FROM indexreceivepay WHERE DATE_FORMAT(receive_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE()) i ORDER BY ino

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY n.notice_no) AS nno, n.* FROM ( SELECT * from noticeview
) n ORDER BY nno DESC LIMIT 0, 6;
